CustomField.description: Account Engagement's categorization of a prospect's current email engagement frequency. This field derives its value from Pardot automation rules to translate from the actual EEF field in Account Engagement to lead/contact records in SFDC.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Account Engagement's categorization of a prospect's current email engagement frequency. This field derives its value from Pardot automation rules to translate from the actual EEF field in Account Engagement to lead/contact records in SFDC.
CustomField.label: Pardot Einstein Email Frequency
